newsitem.title: USA: Ascend expands MFS' UUNET pact.
newsitem.headline: Ascend expands MFS' UUNET pact.

text.p: Ascend Communications Inc said corporate Internet service provider UUNET Technologies has tested and certified the Ascend Pipeline 130 remote access network router for resale to its customers.
The Pipeline 130 product is Ascend's family of fully integrated network access routers offering Integrated Services Digital Network (ISDN), Frame Relay and leased-line remote access data connections.
Asend said UUNET, now a unit of MFS Communications Co Inc, will resell the Pipeline 130 product family to its blue chip corporate customer list.
UUNET had previously acted as a reseller of Ascend's ISDN BRI Pipeline products. The new product integrates several additional, higher speed technologies.
